content: All calm here. Plenty of people have become fullstack engineers in one year (with lots of work), but I’m not married to that idea myself. I’m open to whatever opportunities open themselves. And no, it is definitely not “too extreme”. Did you read the article? Only 15% of engineering positions at top-tech companies are filled by women. There are a LOT of women like me out there — talented and with an affinity for coding, but feeling like there’s no place for them in the world of tech. Grace Hopper provides a much-needed message that “You, woman, are enough. We believe in you so much, we won’t even charge you tuition until you find a job.” If you’d like more information on why the Grace Hopper Program exists, you can learn more here.
